column4: has anyone installed correctly the GSPCA in ubuntu or xubuntu?
HELLO :) has anyone installed correctly the GSPCA in ubuntu or xubuntu?
i have big problems with it, i cant compile it, the manufacturer...well its a driver for 200+ webcams
ok hold on let me try this compile
first...did you read the  README_AND_ISTALL file to see if your camera is suppoerted with this driver?
yes i did, and it is
when i compile i get the same error here look, http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=2501109&group_id=28498&atid=393547
ok this is not compiling here either ...there is  a dependecy missing  but also you may have to contact the developer on this one and tell him exactly the errors   you get in the terminal
bummr i see, some other people got the same error and were able to fix it by installing a old kernel version, what do you think?
that is certainly one options  but  i would suggest contacting the developer  and letting him know...he will answer and I believe there is an email address for him in that README file
dont hesitate to contact a developer especially when they offer their email address
thank you very much i will contact the developer, hoping to get a response from him soon
good   also let me know if he gives you a solution :)
